title: An Online Music Search And A Quest To Find Linda, Lead To 'Jimi'
teaser: A new biopic focuses on the career and life of Jimi Hendrix before he was the musician we know of today. Steve Inskeep talks with writer-director John Ridley about his film: Jimi: All Is By My Side.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
